title: internal_reconcile_report_mismatch Lambda Output
description: The output for the internal_reconcile_report_mismatch Lambda.

jobId.description: The unique ID of the reconciliation job.

anotherPage.description: Indicates if more results can be retrieved on another page.

collectionId.description: Cumulus Collection ID value from the ORCA catalog.

granuleId.description: Cumulus granuleID value from the ORCA catalog.

filename.description: Filename of the object from the ORCA catalog.

keyPath.description: key path and filename of the object in the ORCA catalog.

cumulusArchiveLocation.description: Expected S3 bucket the object is located in Cumulus. From the ORCA catalog.

orcaEtag.description: etag of the object as reported in the ORCA catalog.

s3Etag.description: etag of the object as reported in the S3 bucket

orcaGranuleLastUpdate.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, that information was updated in the ORCA catalog.

s3FileLastUpdate.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, that information was updated in the S3 bucket.

orcaSizeInBytes.description: Size in bytes of the object as reported in the ORCA catalog.

s3SizeInBytes.description: Size in bytes of the object as reported in the S3 bucket.

discrepancyType.description: Type of discrepancy found during reconciliation.

comment.description: Any additional context for the mismatch.
